text: Nivu kapatigalannu nodalillave? Avaru, granthadavara paiki tam'ma dhikkari sahodararodane ‘‘ondu vele nim'mannu (nadininda) hora hakaladare navu kuda nim'ma jote horaduvevu mattu nim'ma visayadalli navendu yarannu anusarisalarevu – mattu nim'ma virud'dha yud'dha nadedare navu nimage neravaguvevu’’ endu heluttare. Avaru sullu heluttiddarembudakke allahane saksiyagiddane
